sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The EU suspends all security cooperation with Niger just days after a military coup Oisted the country's elected president Environment ministers from the world's largest economies have failed to reach an agreement on key climate goals at a meeting in India Greece has lowered its security level from red to orange as crews contain wildfires burning across the Mediterranean region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: After a military coup in Niger earlier this week, the European Union says that it is suspending all security cooperation with the African country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: with the African country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Self-proclaimed new leader General Omar Chiani has suspended the country's constitution but has also sought to reassure global allies. We have to respect all international commitments signed by the Republic of Niger and the human rights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Western leaders have condemned the coup and pledged their support to ousted President Mohamed Bazoum, who was elected just two years ago after the first ever free, democratic and internationally recognized elections in Niger's post-colonial history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: G20 countries have failed to reach a comprehensive agreement on climate targets at a meeting

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: in India.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ministers reached consensus on most issues but couldn't agree on four, including aiming to peak emissions by 2025 and moving to clean energy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: France's representative at the talk said he was very disappointed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We are not able to reach an agreement of increasing drastically renewable energies. Nous ne pouvons pas atteindre un accord sur la phase de l'électricité fossile, surtout l'électricité.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: C'est très difficile de voir ce qui se passe à l'extérieur de cet hôtel, de ce J20 dans le monde réel, et de voir les difficultés de trouver des mots diplomatiques sur ces problèmes environnementaux. and to seize difficulties to find just diplomatic wording on these environmental issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The decisions taken at the meeting will now be passed on to country leaders ahead of a summit in New Delhi in September.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It will be the group's last chance to issue a joint statement on climate this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: joint statement on climate this year. Shattered by explosions at an ammunition depot in Greece triggered by wildfires near the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: central city of Volos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The fire alert level has now gone from red to orange.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A glimpse of hope after nearly 700 blazes erupted in the country in the last 10 days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Italy, 10 major cities have again issued weather warnings for this weekend. The government has called this summer's figures unprecedented, with temperatures higher than ever, peaking at between 46 and 48 degrees Celsius in some regions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: 50,000 hectares of land have burned across Italy since the beginning of the year, according to environmental groups.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Syria, heat waves are putting displaced people at risk, the United Nations has warned, as temperatures reach 46 degrees Celsius.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More than 135 were reported across the country's northwest in July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Almost two million displaced people live in hundreds of camps in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Two people are dead after jumping from the 10th floor of a burning building in Berlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: According to local media, firefighters set out a jump pad to break their fall, but it was designed to save people falling from a maximum of 16 meters, while the apartment in question was almost twice as high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The couple reportedly died on the spot despite attempts to resuscitate them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Another person was rescued using a fire engine ladder.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: More than 100 firefighters were dispatched to fight the blaze which had been extinguished.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: An investigation into the cause is underway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Italian football giants Juventus have been banned from European football next season.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: That's the decision of European governing body UEFA after the club was accused of breaking financial fair play rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The charges include providing fictitious information on the amounts of player transfers and underreporting employee spending and salaries, which in turn allegedly increased the club's capital by 700 million euro. Juventus say that they will not appeal the decision.
